DOC.brief_summary: The present prospective study design compare effect administer daily dose gonadotrophin release hormone ( GnRH ) antagonist vs. alternate-day dosage GnRH agonist ovarian response vitro fertilization ( IVF ) outcome patient stimulate recombinant follicle-stimulating hormone ( FSH ) human chorionic gonadotrophin ( hCG ) microdose .
DOC.brief_title: Ovarian Stimulation Using Recombinant Follicle-stimulating Hormone ( FSH ) Gonadotrophin Releasing Hormone ( GnRH ) Agonist Alternate Days
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion criterion follow : woman good physical mental health , 37 year old , regular menstrual cycle 25-35 day , normal basal FSH luteinizing hormone ( LH ) level , body mass index ( BMI ) less 30 kg/m2 , presence ovary intact uterus , absence polycystic ovary , endometriosis , gynaecological / medical disorder negative result screen sexually transmit disease . No patient receive hormone therapy least 60 day precede study . Eligible patient agree participate randomize two treatment group . Patients allocate GnRH analogue treatment group accord computer-generated randomization table .
DOC.criteria: woman good physical mental health 37 year old , regular menstrual cycle 2535 day normal basal FSH LH level BMI le 30 kg/m2 presence ovary intact uterus absence polycystic ovary endometriosis , gynaecological / medical disorder negative result screen sexually transmit diseases patient sign write informed consent form patient receive hormone therapy least 60 day precede study .
